name: wsdl2rdf
summary: WSDL 2.0 to RDF mapping implementation library
short_description: This library facilitates a creation and management of OWL 2 ontology that describes a web service as defined in WSDL Version 2.0: RDF Mapping W3C specification. While the specification is based OWL 1.1 version, the library uses "The OWL API" which is OWL 2 based.
